== Installation ==
This is a bit tricky as the eemc is too small to install the daily quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip.
Fetch the two zips from http://share.cascaded-web.com/phablet-saga/alpha/ * and put them on your sdcard.
Boot into recovery, do a backup etc. and do a full wipe (including /cache /data /system).
Make sure you have at least 1 gb of free sdcard space (needed for the eemc workaround).
Flash phablet-saga-10.1*.zip first, afterwards the quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip using a version from cdimage.ubuntu.com will not work.
=== Unlocking instructions ===
Go to http://htcdev.com and follow the information provided by HTC.
=== link to images ===
<nowiki>[[http://share.cascaded-web.com/phablet-saga/alpha/2013-04-07_00-35/ | 2013-04-07_00-35]]</nowiki>
== Known issues ==
* Battery indicator not working 
* Some gestures are hard to do 
* Camera does not work 
* And a lot more thought 
== The image ==
Many thanks to <nowiki>[[https://github.com/Andromadus|Andromadus]]</nowiki> Team for maintaining the kernel and a lot of other parts needed to build Ubuntu Phone for HTC Desire S!
=== How to build it ===
Initialize your repo with git://github.com/phablet-saga/android.git
Add the ubuntu/hybris (lp:phablet-extras/libhybris) and ubuntu/platform-api (lp:platform-api) parts.
Run brunch cm_saga-eng

=== Redistributability ===
Everything apart from the binary vendor blobs.
